unnormalised: OMG, you guys, the Bollywood goss is sizzling this week! Forget your chai, this is way hotter.

unnormalised: First up, remember that super awkward awards show last month, the Star Screen Awards 2024? Well, apparently, things were even MORE tense backstage between Alia Bhatt and Kiara Advani. Sources say there was major side-eye action happening when Alia’s Best Actress win was announced. Someone even overheard Kiara muttering something about "Nepotism Rocks!" under her breath. Ouch! Talk about a Delhi ki shaadi drama!

unnormalised: And speaking of Delhi, have you seen the pictures of Ranveer Singh supposedly hanging out with Deepika Padukone’s alleged ex in Hauz Khas Village?! The internet is blowing up! unnormalised: Then there's the whole Ranbir Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor saga. Remember that movie *Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar*? Well, apparently, the on-screen chemistry didn't exactly translate to off-screen love. Rumour has it they absolutely clashed during filming, especially regarding the dance choreography for "Show Me The Thumka." Apparently, Shraddha felt Ranbir wasn't pulling his weight (literally and figuratively, LOL!). The poor choreographer must have been pulling his hair out, travelling all the way from Goregaon every day.

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, whispers are circling about a certain young starlet being accepted into the Film and Television Institute of India (FTII), purely based on her famous father's influence. Connections, connections, everywhere! This smells like a major investigation is needed. Seriously, when will merit actually count for something in Bollywood? Itna unfair!
